data.author: Bill Watterson
data.quote: If people sat outside the looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently

data.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
data.quote: Every creator painfully experiences the chasm between his inner vision and its ultimate expression

data.author: William Lyon Phelps
data.quote: If I didn't start painting, I would have raised chickens

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower

data.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
data.quote: A pure hand needs no glove to cover it

data.author: Euripides
data.quote: The greatest pleasure of life is love

data.author: Wallace Stevens
data.quote: In the world of words, the imagination is one of the forces of nature

data.author: Arne Jacobsen
data.quote: If a building becomes architecture, then it is art

data.author: Diogenes
data.quote: What I like to drink most is wine that belongs to others

data.author: Hippocrates
data.quote: Life is short, the art is long

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.quote: Every portrait that is painted with feeling is a portrait of the artist, not the sitter

data.author: Bertrand Russell
data.quote: It is preoccupation with possession, more than anything else, that prevents men from living freely and nobly.

data.author: Bertrand Russell
data.quote: To fear love is to fear life.

data.author: Bertrand Russell
data.quote: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty.  To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.

data.author: Bertrand Russell
data.quote: Three passions, simply but overwhelmingly strong, have governed my life:  the longing for love, the search for knowledge, and the unbearable pity for the suffering of mankind.

data.author: David Hume
data.quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.

data.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
data.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.

data.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
data.quote: A good mind possesses a kingdom.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous.
